Articles.Content:
Don't know if i'm the only person who's having this problem but if i start a new career with mods installed i can not recover any vessels but if i start a new career without mods then install them i can recover as normal.

if you were wondering how to fix this there you go.
Try find oit which mod causes it by a proccess of elimination. Disable one mod at a time and then when the problem stops you know which mod caused it.
I had this problem when .25 first came out, uninstall DebRefund. Try StageRecovery instead.
